title: Chapter 2555 - 2555 Chapter 2554-Killing The Martial G.O.D
body:
Chapter 2555 - 2555 Chapter 2554-Killing The Martial G.O.D

2555 Chapter 2554-killing the martial G.o.d

The non-human divine ancestor used all his strength and finally seized the opportunity to break free from the ancestral Dragon’s obstruction and charge toward Lu Ming.

BOOM!

The non-human divine ancestor threw a punch. A golden fist crossed the boundless void and headed toward Lu Ming with overwhelming power.

Lu Ming’s expression changed slightly. He shook the great desolation spear and thrust it out.

As soon as he thrust his spear, the non-human divine ancestor’s fist arrived and collided with Lu Ming’s spear radiance.

With a deafening boom, the great desolation spear shook continuously. A terrifying force was transmitted, causing Lu Ming to take a few steps back.

“A divine artifact…”

Lu Ming’s eyes flickered!

The non-human divine ancestor was wearing a Golden Glove on his fist.. It was obvious that this pair of gloves was a divine weapon, a weapon specially used by the martial G.o.d, and it was extremely powerful.

Sacred ancestor bloodheart’s divine weapon had self-destructed, but the non-human divine ancestor’s was still there. Thus, his battle-power was slightly stronger than sacred ancestor bloodheart’s, who had burned his divine power.

“Kill!”

The non-human divine ancestor bellowed. His fists were like two Golden Suns as he punched toward Lu Ming.

“Moke, I’m your opponent!”

Now that the ancestral Dragon had arrived, he would not allow the divine ancestor to attack Lu Ming. Ile stepped out with his dragon claws and fought the divine ancestor.

At the same time, a Dragon Horn floated above the ancestral dragon’s head. It kept slashing out like a saber. It was also a divine weapon.

The ancestral Dragon’s combat power wasn’t any weaker than the non-human divine ancestor’s. He couldn’t take it lightly and had to fight the ancestral Dragon with all his might.

BOOM! ROOM!

The non-human divine ancestor exchanged a few more blows with the ancestral Dragon, while Lu Ming seized the opportunity to continue refining sacred ancestor bloodheart.

Saint ancestor bloodheart kept erupting, trying to break through Lu Ming’s defense.

‘Moke, save me, save me!”

Sacred ancestor bloodheart roared.

The non-human divine ancestor’s face was extremely cold. He exchanged a few blows with the ancestral Dragon in a frenzy. He gritted his teeth and suddenly changed his move. He risked taking a blow from the ancestral Dragon and then rushed toward Lu Ming.

Buzzzzzz!

In the blink of an eye, the non-human divine ancestor closed in on Lu Ming and threw hundreds of punches. Lu Ming waved the great desolation spear to block it.

The non-human divine ancestor’s strength was indeed astonishing after hundreds of collisions. Lu Ming had to resist the non-human divine ancestor and ultimately didn’t have the extra energy to refine the sacred ancestor bloodheart. As a result, the sacred ancestor bloodheart managed to escape.

Sacred ancestor bloodheart escaped and regrouped with the non-human sacred ancestor.

“Let’s go, let’s retreat!’

The non-human divine ancestor said. Right now, they were at a complete disadvantage. They could only retreat and make plans later.

“If you want to leave, then stay!”

The ancestral Dragon’s horn was like a heavenly blade that kept slashing at the non-human divine ancestor. The non-human divine ancestor had to focus when facing the ancestral Dragon’s attack.

Buzzzzzz! &Nbsp; Whoosh!…

Lu Ming also brandished his spear, and the dazzling spear light enveloped the non-human divine ancestor and the murderous heart divine ancestor.

Saint ancestor bloodheart’s combat strength had declined, and he was no longer a match for Lu Ming and the others. He could only resist with the help of the non-human divine ancestor.

At this moment, the non-human divine ancestor had to face the ancestral Dragon and defend against Lu Ming’s attacks at the same time. He was at a disadvantage.

“Battle symbol art…

In the process of the battle, Lu Ming constantly activated the battle formula in an attempt to double his combat power.

The two sides exchanged dozens of blows in a row, and the non-human divine ancestor and the sacred ancestor bloodheart were forced to retreat.

BOOM!

All of a sudden, there seemed to be an explosion in Lu Ming’s body. The double combat power of the battle character formula was triggered, and Lu Ming’s combat strength skyrocketed.

Buck.com

The non-human divine ancestor hurriedly blocked the spear light with his fists.

BOOM!

This time, the non-human divine ancestor was sent flying by Lu Ming, His body trembled and he spat out a mouthful of blood.

“How is this possible?”

The non-human divine ancestor roared in his heart. This was simply unbelievable.

At this stage of the battle, Lu Ming could actually erupt with even stronger combat strength. Moreover, I was

a huge increase and he had completely suppressed him.

As soon as the non-human divine ancestor retreated, sacred ancestor bloodheart was exposed.

“Kill!”

Lu Ming let out a long roar. The great desolation spear turned into a pillar that held up the sky and smashed toward Saint ancestor bloodheart.

Saint ancestor bloodheart turned into a sea of blood, rolling wildly. He wanted to Dodge, but he couldn’t. Al this moment, Lu Ming had activated the double combat power of the battle character formula. Under the pressure of the great desolation spear, the sea of blood formed by Saint ancestor bloodheart was directly split in hall.

A terrifying destructive power burst out of the great desolation spear. The sea of blood formed by Saint. ancestor bloodheart kept shattering and turning into small pieces.

“Refine!”

Then, Lu Ming used his ruler’s power to envelop the small pieces of the sea of blood and began to refine them.

Chi Chi Chi …

Green smoke filled the air as sacred ancestor bloodheart’s blood sea was refined at an extremely fast speed.

“Moke, save me, save me…” He cried.

Sacred ancestor bloodheart was still calling for help.

murderer Xin, go in peace. Mo ke can’t save you!

The ancestral Dragon said coldly as he charged toward the non-human divine ancestor.

At this moment, the non-human divine ancestor’s face was dark, and there was madness in the depths of his eyes. He didn’t fight the ancestral Dragon. Instead, he turned and rushed to the other side.

That was the direction of the Tai Qing heavenly region.

‘Not good!”

The ancestral Dragon seemed to have thought of something, and his face changed drastically as he chased after the non-human divine ancestor.

“Lu Ming, hurry up and chase after her. We can’t let Moke reach the taiqing heavenly region …”

The ancestral Dragon’s voice came. He seemed to be very anxious.

“Kill!”

Lu Ming waved his hands and endless spear radiance appeared out of thin air, allacking the remaining blood

sca.

“No…”

die! sacred ancestor bloodheart roared. Then, endless spear radiance descended and tore apart the sea of blood. It then dissipated under the refinement of the ruler’s power.

In an instant, Saint ancestor bloodheart had completely disappeared. Not a single trace was left behind. This time, sacred ancestor bloodheart had been completely annihilated. There was no chance of her being

resurrected.

A martial G.o.d had been completely killed by Lu Ming!

After completely annihilating the sacred ancestor bloodheart, Lu Ming sped up to the maximum and chased after the ancestral Dragon and the non-human divine ancestor.

All of this took time to describe, but it actually happened in an instant.

However, the divine ancestor of the non-human race had already reached the taiqing heavenly domain and

arrived next to the lair of Zulong.

“Moke…

The ancestral Dragon roared and spat out a destructive light beam toward the non-human divine ancestor. However, the non-human divine ancestor’s eyes were filled with madness. Ile didn’t care about the ancestral Dragon’s attack and punched out.

The terrifying power directly shattered the s.p.a.ce within a radius of ten million miles. Through the s.p.a.ce, one

could clearly see the appearance of a small world.

This small world was the lair of Zulong.

The non-human divine ancestor’s terrifying punch landed on the lair of Zulong.

The lair of Zulong was like a balloon that exploded with a punch from the non-human divine ancestor.

After the lair of Zulong was blown up, the void suddenly filled with a dazzling golden radiance.

From afar, Lu Ming could see a huge and boundless sigil covering the sky.

“That’s…”

Lu Ming’s pupils constricted in shock. He had never expected that there would be such a huge sigil behind

the lair of Zulong.

heaven suppressing seal! Ancestral Dragon, you’re delusional to seal the sky. Today, I’ll tear the seal apart

and bury all of you with me! The non-human divine ancestor roared as his entire body seemed to be on fire. He transformed into a divine

sword and charged toward the seal.
